definition: (of a mountain) high and tapered peak or summit/mountain-like in appearance/highest level/classifier for camels

sentences.english: France-Italy the frontier Mont Blanc rises 4810 meters, for Europe absolute peak.
sentences.chinese: 法意边境的勃朗峰海拔4810米，为欧洲最高峰。

sentences.english: Mont Blanc and its surrounding area is known as Europe's best mountain scenic spot.
sentences.chinese: 勃朗峰及其周边地区被号称为欧洲最佳山景区。

sentences.english: Mont Blanc or Monte Bianco is the highest mountain in the Alps, Western Europe and the European Union.
sentences.chinese: 勃朗峰或白朗峰是阿尔卑斯山的最高峰，位于西欧。

sentences.english: The Conte de Blanc region in France has several famous champagne houses.
sentences.chinese: 伯爵德在法国勃朗峰地区有几个著名的香槟酒厂。

sentences.english: Mont Blanc is the highest peak in the Apls.
sentences.chinese: 勃朗峰是阿尔卑斯山脉中最高的山峰。

sentences.english: I dimbed Mount Blance in Switzerland with my friend.
sentences.chinese: 在瑞士我跟朋友爬过勃朗峰。

sentences.english: Mont Blanc is higher than all other Alpine peaks.
sentences.chinese: 勃朗峰比阿尔卑斯山所有其他山峰都高。

definition: Mt Cook on New Zealand South Island, national park and highest peak
Lhotse Mountain, between Tibet and Nepal
Mt Elbrus, the highest peak of the Caucasus Mountains
K2, Mt Qogir or Chogori in Karakorum section of Himalayas

pinyin: Qi3 li4 ma3 zha1 luo2 shan1

definition: Mt Shishapangma or Xixiabangma in Tibet (8012 m)
abbr. for 珠穆朗瑪峰|珠穆朗玛峰, Mt Chomolungma or Qomolangma (Tibetan)/Mt Everest/Nepalese: Sagarmatha
Dhaulagiri, mountain massif in the Himalayas
Cerro Aconcagua, mountain in the Americas
